roleset.name: be a previous owner

example.name: adjectival
example.text: According to related data , last year saw property prices in 70 large to medium sized cities grow by 1.5 % year over year , of which prices for newly built homes increased by 1.3 % and pre-owned homes 2.4 % , yet property rental prices decreased by 0.6 % .

roleset.note: PREOWN-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from preown.01-v)
